CustomField.description: Field "Contract Code" that has been set up on each "Purchasing Contract" in EAM. The Value is unique per Subcontractor (e.g. 310001807 for Hydrotech) . This is used e.g. in the Subcontractors Claim process and is required as a column in the report/upload template in EAM.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field "Contract Code" on the "Purchasing Contract" in EAM. The Value is unique per Subcontractor (e.g. 310001807 for Hydrotech).
CustomField.label: Contract Code
